job_description: OverviewmyBestHelper is seeking a junior to intermediate iOS engineer to develop our iOS application, currently live in the AppStore.  The app is a companion to our www.mybesthelper.com service designed to create an exceptional, unified web and mobile experience for our paying clients.  You will have the ability to impact our product strategy, work with a fast-growing and high profile start-up and with our accelerator Invoke Labs, makers of Hootsuite
job_requirements: Recommended Skills Excellent knowledge of common iOS frameworks such as UIKit, MapKit, Core Graphics, and Core Location. Knowledge of web service technologies and services (specifically REST APIs and JSON). Experience with social platform integration (Facebook SDK, Accounts and Social Frameworks) The ability to create clean, well documented, object oriented code, using best practices. Strong knowledge of the Xcode IDE. A working knowledge of the Adobe suite of design tools (Fireworks, Photoshop, Illustrator). Strong organizational and time management skills. Good verbal and written communication skills Appreciation for Agile development and beautiful/efficient code. Great sense of style, design, and usability.Nice to Have Attributes• Ruby on Rails 3+• HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery and CSS3• API development experienceWe Offer• Full time employment• Competitive compensation• A highly experienced team of co-workers• Flexible work schedule• An office in the center of Vancouver’s hi-tech communityOpen To All Majors:No
